text: snqdhf fi qulub aladhin kafaruu ashdd alfazae walkhawf bsbb 'ishrakhm biallah alihatan mzewmt, lays lahum dalil 'aw burhan ealaa asthqaqha llebadt mae allh, fhalthm fi aldnya: reb whle min almwmnyn, 'amaa mkanhm fi alakhirat aldhy yawwn 'iilayh fahu alnar; wdhlk bsbb zalamahum wedwanhm, wasa' hdha almaqam mqamana lhm
